data.text: @SpeckledJim24 @bango_don @KieranMaguire @EFL Did you ever get a reply? No wonder their club is a mess, the way they dream up these numbers. Derbys numbers haven’t been submitted since 2018, yet they all turn into accountants when Forest numbers are published

@KieranMaguire Is that 202:100 of Covid affected income?
